sentences.en: According to the sources, East Star Airlines operations difficult, nearly insolvent.
sentences.cn: 据该人士透露, 东星航空运营困难, 几近资不抵债.

sentences.en: As such it is beneficial to know about the process of insolvent liquidation of a company.
sentences.cn: 正因为如此,能够了解关于公司在资不抵债的情况下清盘的相关问题是很有益处的.

sentences.en: But many banks are now assumed to be not only illiquid but insolvent.
sentences.cn: 但是现在许多银行被认为不但仅是流动性差,并且是无偿付才干.

sentences.en: But more than a few toppled into bankruptcy, and some became insolvent.
But the question we really should be asking is: why keep insolvent banks afloat?
sentences.cn: 但我们真正应该问的是,为什么要保住这些无力偿债的银行?

sentences.en: It has the power to expel companies or dealers believed to be dishonest or insolvent.
sentences.cn: 它有权开除那些被认为不守信用或无偿付能力的公司或经纪人.

sentences.en: Once unsecured debtholders of insolvent banks lose, market discipline would return to the whole sector.
sentences.cn: 一旦无力偿债银行的无担保债权人真的遭受损失, 市场纪律就将重返整个行业.

sentences.en: That year, his 40 - year - old is the most beautiful men of the age, he has become insolvent.
sentences.cn: 那一年, 他40 岁,正是男人最风光的年龄, 他却破产了.

sentences.en: The banking system is severely undercapitalized, with numerous insolvent banks.
sentences.cn: 银行体系正面临严重的资本不足, 许多银行失去偿债能力.

sentences.en: The company has been declared insolvent.
sentences.cn: 这家公司被宣布破产了。
公司被宣布无清偿能力.

sentences.en: The company was later declared insolvent (= officially said to be insolvent ).
The extent laid on the house by court made the insolvent man homeless.
sentences.cn: 法院对这个破产者房产的扣押使他无家可归.

sentences.en: Today, the big four state banks in China are, essentially, insolvent.
sentences.cn: 今天, 中国四大国有银行已经基本不具备清偿能力.

sentences.en: When inspector told him that his company was insolvent.
sentences.cn: 检查员告诉克里斯他的公司无偿债能力时.

trans.tran_cn: 无力偿付债务的，破产的
trans.tran_en: not having enough money to pay what you owe
